The train station of Lleida is located on street Plaça de Ramón Berenguer IV.

Lleida is on the AVE train route from both Madrid and Barcelona.  If you land in Madrid, it will be a direct AVE trip of approximately 3 hours.  If landing in Barcelona, the direct AVE train ride will be only an hour.

The cheaper (and slower) choice is to get a bus. The bus station of Lleida is situated 1,3 km from the train station into south-west on street Carrer Saracíbar 2. (Buses from Andorra or Barcelona may stop also in train station.)

value: Direct bus from Madrid (27e), Barcelona (20e) and Andorra la Vella (19e).
Direct bus from Andorra la Vella (18e).

Lleida is quite small and you will easily be able to get to all parts of it on foot.  There is a very efficient city bus system as well.  Multiple lines of bus service are available from the train station.

value: content=This church sits atop the highest point in the city, nice viewing.
content=Park in northeastern part of the city.
content=Located less than 1km from the train station. Room price includes breakfast (croissant & caffee) and WiFi. (No elevator in the building.)
